headline: Does Lamb Weston (LW) Production Consolidation Reveal a Deeper Shift in Its Global Efficiency Strategy?
summary: Lamb Weston Holdings has closed its Munro, Argentina plant and consolidated Latin American production at its newer Mar del Plata facility, while also temporarily curtailing a line in the Netherlands as part of its Focus to Win efficiency program, with affected Munro employees receiving severance in line with local regulations. This consolidation and production curtailment highlight how Lamb Weston is reshaping its manufacturing footprint to balance cost efficiency, regional capacity, and...

headline: Has Lamb Weston (LW) Share Slump Opened A New Valuation Opportunity
summary: If you are wondering whether Lamb Weston Holdings is starting to look interesting at current levels, this article walks through what the recent share price means for value focused investors. The stock last closed at US$41.37, with returns of 0.2% over 7 days, a 30.7% decline over 30 days, a 2.2% decline year to date, and declines of 30.2%, 55.5%, and 42.8% over 1, 3, and 5 years respectively. These moves may change how you think about risk and potential upside. These moves sit against a...
